a1: HEX (#RRGGBB), RGB (0-255), HSL (hue, saturation, lightness), and CMYK (cyan, magenta, yellow, key/black).
q2: Can I input colors in any format?
a2: You can input via HEX code or adjust RGB sliders. All other formats update automatically in real time.
a3: The HEX input supports 8-digit hex codes with alpha (#RRGGBBAA). RGB and HSL display is for opaque colors.
